propertyGroup.name: Outlet Properties
propertyGroup.documentation: Defines the locations to which output is generated.

property.name: ejb-configuration
property.documentation: Diretorio onde as os arquivos de configuracao do ejb serao criados.

property.name: jboss-config
property.documentation: Diretorio onde os arquivos de configuracao relacionados ao jboss serao criados.

property.name: module-ejb-configuration
property.documentation: Diretorio onde as os arquivos de configuracao do ejb (modularizados) serao criados.

property.name: shared-session-beans
property.documentation: Diretorio onde as classes ejb compartilhadas serão geradas.

property.name: shared-session-beans-impl
property.documentation: Diretorio onde as classes ejb compartilhadas serão geradas.

property.name: initial-service
property.documentation: Defines the locations to which the initial service files are generated.

property.name: initial-service-impl
property.documentation: Defines the locations to which the initial service files are generated.

property.name: project-configuration
property.documentation: Diretorio onde os arquivos do maven serao gerados

property.name: controleAcesso
property.documentation: Diretorio onde as classes relacionadas ao controle de acesso sao geradas

property.name: controleAcessoPerfilParser
property.documentation: Diretorio onde os arquivos para configurar os perfis estao

property.name: controleAcessoImpl
property.documentation: Diretorio onde as classes relacionadas ao controle de acesso sao geradas

property.name: entity-beans
property.documentation: The directory to which Entity EJBs are generated.

property.name: entity-impls
property.documentation: The location to which Entity EJB implementation files are generated.

property.name: session-beans
property.documentation: The directory to which Session Bean files are generated.

property.name: session-impls
property.documentation: The directory to which Session Bean implementation files are generated.

property.name: messageDriven-beans
property.documentation: The directory to which Message Driven Bean files are generated.

property.name: messageDriven-impls
property.documentation: The directory to which Message Driven Bean implementation files are generated.

property.name: shared-messageDrivenClient-beans
property.documentation: The directory to which Singleton Sender JMS Messages files are generated.

property.name: shared-messageDrivenClient-impls
property.documentation: The directory to which Singleton Sender implementation JMS Messages files are generated.

property.name: value-objects
property.documentation: The directory to which isomorphic value objects are generated.

property.name: statistics
property.documentation: Place which the reports will be placed. Use for internal statistics.

property.name: jndiNamePrefix
property.documentation: The prefix to give to the EJB JNDI names (this allows the same EJBs to be deployed multiple times in the same container)

property.name: transactionType
property.documentation:
The default value to use for transaction types.
Permitted values are:
NotSupported
Supports
Required
RequiresNew
Mandatory
Never
NOTE: Can be overridden on a per entity basis with the @andromda.ejb.transaction.type tagged value.

property.name: serviceLocatorName
property.documentation: The name to give to the generated service locator class.

property.name: securityRealm
property.documentation: The name of the security realm (i.e. animal-quiz, other, etc). NOTE:This enables EJB security if specified.

property.name: modelPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de dominio.

property.name: servicePackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de dominio.

property.name: wsdPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de webService.

property.name: ServicePackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de servicos.

property.name: webPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de apresentacao.

property.name: transferPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de trasnferencia.

property.name: controleAcessoDefault
property.documentation: Necessidade da geração do ControleAcessoImpl já implementado.

property.name: controleAcessoDir
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de controle de acesso.

property.name: actionPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de acoes.

property.name: CRUDStereotype
property.documentation: estereotipo para dependencia entre entidade e servico para criacao de metodos CRUD

property.name: xmlEncoding
property.documentation: encoding do xml

property.name: webSrv
property.documentation: Name of WebService Sterotype

property.name: JMSConnectionFactory
property.documentation: Name of JMS Connectionfactory

property.name: JMSQueue
property.documentation: Name of JMS queue

property.name: defaultQueue
property.documentation: Name of a JMS default queue

property.name: webServiceGeneralizationFormat
property.documentation: teste

property.name: utilDir
property.documentation: Diretorio onde serao gerados os arquivos utilitarios

property.name: loggerName
property.documentation: Indica o nome do Logger

property.name: loggerPackage
property.documentation: Indica o pacote do logger

property.name: exportPackageName
property.documentation: Nome do pacote de transferencia.

property.name: JMSQueueRedeliveryDelay
property.documentation: Tempo em milisegundos de espera antes que a mensagem seja reentregue apos um nack

property.name: JMSQueueRedeliveryLimit
property.documentation: O numero maximo de vezes que uma mensagem e nacked antes que ela seja entregue ao DLQ

property.name: JMSQueueMaxDepth
property.documentation: Profundidade maxima da fila

property.name: JMSQueueMessageCounterHistoryDayLimit
property.documentation: Numero de dias para manter o historico do MessageCounter

property.name: ServiceFactorySelectNodeName
property.documentation: Nome que identifica qual Servico sera chamado pela Factory

property.name: mavenRepoProject
property.documentation: URL do repositorio maven do projeto

property.name: demanda
property.documentation: Indicacao se o controle de acesso sera feito por demanda ou nao

property.name: webServiceComAutenticacao
property.documentation: Indicacao se os web services terao autenticacao ou nao

property.name: oAuthServer
property.documentation: Indica que o sistema deve ser um servidor oAuth

property.name: dataSourceName
property.documentation: The name of data source.

property.name: ejb3
property.documentation: The name of data source.

property.name: jbossVersion
property.documentation: Indica a versão do Jboss (4 ou 6).
